document_data.name: Vrag
document_data.mainbody: '''Vrag''' was a [[cornugon]] lieutenant in [[Dragonspear Castle]] circa [[1363 DR]].
document_data.History: Vrag led one of the [[Hordes of Dragonspear]], specifically the [[Marauders]], a group composed of one unit of 500 [[kobold]]s and one unit of 500 [[goblin]]s led by the able chieftain [[Pruj]].
document_data.Personality: Vrag disliked his current position, believing he led the weakest army. In order to impress [[Baazka]], he ordered his warriors to make very dangerous assaults.
